channel.title: Comments on: Two of Pentacles: On Shifting Ground
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: suzmuse
item.dc:creator: suzmuse
item.description: 'don't focus on what you want. focus on what you love.' taking that forward today!!!!
item.content:encoded:
‘don’t focus on what you want. focus on what you love.’
taking that forward today!!!!

item.title: By: Tisdale Flannery
item.dc:creator: Tisdale Flannery
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://lunastationquarterly.com/two-of-pentacles-on-shifting-ground/#comment-598">Amanda Linehan</a>.
Oh, thanks, Amanda! I'm so glad!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Amanda Linehan.

Oh, thanks, Amanda! I’m so glad!

item.title: By: Amanda Linehan
item.dc:creator: Amanda Linehan
item.description: Tisdale - Not a half hour before reading this I was thinking about a situation in my life where I could move forwards or go backwards and then I read "Donâ€™t try to move forward by looking back." Thanks. ;)
item.content:encoded: Tisdale – Not a half hour before reading this I was thinking about a situation in my life where I could move forwards or go backwards and then I read “Donâ€™t try to move forward by looking back.” Thanks. ðŸ˜‰
